Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Treviso to Montagnana, take a tour between water and land: from the charming canals of the Venice Lagoon to the artistic and cultural city of Padua.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.Episode: From Lake Garda to the Belluno Dolomites
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Lake Garda to the Belluno Dolomites we continue our journey along the Brenta river with its amazing Palladio's villas and Verona with its Arena, where Shakespeare located the most famous love story ever, Romeo and Juliet.

Clip.Title: IMAX ORIGINALS: ARABIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride the dunes with a camel caravan, dive into the treasure laden Red Seas, explore the ruins of a lost city and get to know Arabia.

Clip.Title: IMAX ORIGINALS: KILIMANJARO
Clip.Episode: Kilimanjaro: To The Roof of Africa
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A look at the cultural and natural history of Africa's highest peak.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: BARACK OBAMA: GREAT EXPECTATIONS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go inside the White House and behind the scenes of Barack Obama's first term as President as he confronts major crises as well as Opposition determined to take him down.

Clip.Title: BARACK OBAMA: GREAT EXPECTATIONS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go inside the White House and behind the scenes of Barack Obama's first term as President as he has confronts major crises as well as Opposition determined to take him down.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Treviso to Montagnana, take a tour between water and land: from the charming canals of the Venice Lagoon to the artistic and cultural city of Padua.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.Episode: From Lake Garda to the Belluno Dolomites
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Lake Garda to the Belluno Dolomites we continue our journey along the Brenta river with its amazing Palladio's villas and Verona with its Arena, where Shakespeare located the most famous love story ever, Romeo and Juliet.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the highlands of the Americas to the world-famous tidal flats of the Bay of Fundy, this exploration of Nova Scotia reveals some of the world's best-kept secrets - here, on the edge of Canada.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Isaac Brocks's daring made him a hero during the early months of the War of 1812, but it may also have been his fatal flaw.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Technology is advancing at a geometric rate. Find out how far we have come and how far our minds are going to innovate.

Clip.Title: DECODING CHRISTIANITY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Unlock the mysteries of Christian art and architecture, revealing the meaning behind its symbols and iconography.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the highlands of the Americas to the world-famous tidal flats of the Bay of Fundy, this exploration of Nova Scotia reveals some of the world's best-kept secrets - here, on the edge of Canada.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Isaac Brocks's daring made him a hero during the early months of the War of 1812, but it may also have been his fatal flaw.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Technology is advancing at a geometric rate. Find out how far we have come and how far our minds are going to innovate.

Clip.Title: THE SWEET LADY WITH THE NASTY VOICE
Clip.Episode: The Sweet Lady with the Nasty Voice
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of the first lady of rockabilly and one of Elvis's girlfriends - rock 'n' roll pioneer Wanda Jackson.

Clip.Title: KURU: SCIENCE AND THE SORCERY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An Australian researcher discovers the cause of a crippling plague in New Guinea, and finds how the affliction the isolated tribe suffers from became a global concern.

Clip.Title: ARABIA UNCOVERED
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover Saudi Arabia's fascinating past, captured in over 200 artifacts. Each item reveals stories of the migrants, traders, and pilgrims who have been drawn to this land for centuries.

Clip.Title: HITTITES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Chronicle the history of the Middle-Eastern civilization that existed alongside ancient Egypt for centuries.

Clip.Title: LIONS IN BATTLE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: After a harsh season, the lionesses of The Okavango Delta in southern Africa struggle to feed their cubs, often entering enemy territory to find food to save their pride.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Zoom above (and below) some of the Golden State's greatest monuments in stunning HD realism.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the highlands of the Americas to the world-famous tidal flats of the Bay of Fundy, this exploration of Nova Scotia reveals some of the world's best-kept secrets - here, on the edge of Canada.

Clip.Title: KURU: SCIENCE AND THE SORCERY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An Australian researcher discovers the cause of a crippling plague in New Guinea, and finds how the affliction the isolated tribe suffers from became a global concern.

Clip.Title: BOTS OR BODIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Is man or machine better equipped to handle the rigors and risks of space exploration? Now that Mars is in our sights, would we be pushing our luck or pushing the boundaries?

Clip.Title: TANK ON THE MOON
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Revealing near-lost stories about Soviet-made robots that patrolled the Lunar surface in the 1970s.

Clip.Title: THE INCREDIBLE BIONIC MAN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The quest to build and animate an artificial being entirely from bionic parts shows the incredible strides we've made in body replacement technologies.

Clip.Title: BOTS OR BODIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Is man or machine better equipped to handle the rigors and risks of space exploration? Now that Mars is in our sights, would we be pushing our luck or pushing the boundaries?
